level.heading: Penalty.
level.text: Any person who willfully violates this subchapter or any rule, regulation, or order issued pursuant to this subchapter shall be guilty of a misdemeanor and, upon conviction, subject to a fine not exceeding $1,000. Prosecution shall be in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia by information signed by the Corporation Counsel.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-83
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-83, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-801.
